title: Vexatious Litigants
context: [CHAPTER 634J] VEXATIOUS LITIGANTS Section 634J-1 Definitions 634J-2 Motion for order requiring plaintiff to post security 634J-3 Hearing procedure 634J-4 Finding; amount of security 634J-5 Dismissal on failure to post security 634J-6 Motion as stay of proceedings 634J-7 Vexatious litigant; prefiling order prohibiting filing of new litigation Cross References Nonconsensual common law liens, see chapter 507D. Case Notes This chapter and ยง634J-7 are applicable where a party seeks to maintain litigation in an existing case, such as by the filing of a motion, as well as to the filing of an entirely new case. 102 H. 289, 75 P.3d 1180 (2003).
